author: Hugues Ross

game.author: Wuzzy
game.name: repixture
game.short_description: Simplistic sandbox survival game that plays in mostly lush biomes in a mostly peaceful world and only simple technologies.
game.title: Repixture

long_description:
Example mod for [Cartographer](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Hugues%20Ross/cartographer/) that adds mapmaking to [Repixture](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/repixture/).

# Contact
For questions, requests, and other communications regarding this work, you can contact the original creator at huguesross@posteo.com or open an issue on Codeberg.
name: cartographer_repixture
short_description: Adds regional maps that you can craft and place (Repixture version)
title: Cartographer for Repixture
